issue_log: async def functions are not natively supported
You need to install a suitable plugin for your async framework
pytest-asyncio plugin is installed but not being recognized
FIXED: Removed duplicate pytest configuration from pyproject.toml to resolve asyncio plugin conflicts
message: async def functions are not natively supported. You need to install a suitable plugin for your async framework, for example: anyio, pytest-asyncio, pytest-tornasync, pytest-trio, pytest-twisted

structured_details.configuration_issue: pytest.ini asyncio_mode configuration may be incorrect

solution: Verify pytest.ini asyncio_mode configuration is properly set to 'auto'
Check that all async test functions are properly decorated with @pytest.mark.asyncio if needed
Ensure pytest-asyncio plugin is properly loaded in conftest.py
Update test fixtures to use proper async/await patterns
Consider adding pytest_plugins configuration to conftest.py
